title: GE Counter Depth French Door Refrigerator PYE22KSKSS
description:
Features:

Counter-depth design 
Offers a built-in look by fitting nearly flush with surrounding cabinetry
Hands-free Autofill 
Lets you walk away while the dispenser automatically fills any container with filtered water
Full-width, electronic temperature-controlled drawer with colored LED lights 
3 accurate settings deliver the optimal temperature for your favorite foods, while colored lights indicate the chosen setting
TwinChill™ evaporators 
Separate climates in the fresh food and freezer sections help keep foods fresh
Second icemaker option 
Always have extra ice on hand with an optional second icemaker in the freezer (sold separately)
Showcase LED lighting 
Positioned throughout the interior and under fresh food doors to spotlight foods inside the refrigerator and in the freezer
Quick Space shelf 
Quickly slides out of the way to make room for tall items
ADA Compliant
Specifications:

Capacity
Freezer Capacity	7.2
Fresh Food Capacity	15.0
Total Capacity (cubic feet)	22.2
General
Dispenser	Large Color-Matched. Cubes, Crushed Ice and Water
Freezer Storage Baskets	2 Full-Width
Performance Features	Easily Removable Door Gaskets. Sabbath Mode Capable
Configuration	French Door
Defrost Type	Frost Guard
Temperature Management System	TwinChill™ Evaporators
Dispenser Features	Hands-Free AutoFill. Door Alarm. LED Dispenser Light. Water Filter Indicator Light
Freezer Door Bins	1 Total
Fresh Food Cabinet Shelves	5 Total - Glass with Silver Trim. 4 Split Adjustable; 1 Full-Width. 3 Spill Proof. 1 Quick Space Shelf
Water Filtration	Advanced Filtration System (RPWFE). Removes Pharmaceuticals
Exterior Style	Counter-Depth
Leveling System	2 Front Leveling Legs
Fresh Food Features	Showcase LED Lighting (7)
Fresh Food Door Bins	6 Total. 3 with Gallon Storage. 2 Adjustable
Freezer Features	Turbo Freeze. Interior Lighting - LED (2)
Temperature Management Features	Turbo Cool setting
Control Type	External Electronic Digital Temperature Display
Fresh Food Cabinet Drawers	3 Total. 2 Adjustable Humidity. 1 Full-Width, Adjustable Temperature Drawer. Electronic Temperature Control w/ Colored LED Lighting
Fresh Food Door Features	Dairy Compartment. Drop Down Tray
Icemaker	Space Saving Ice. Optional 2nd Icemaker in Freezer
Filter Location	In Case
Appearance
Handle Color	Stainless Steel w/Chrome
Hidden Door Hinge(s)	Yes
Counter-Depth Design	Yes
Door Stops	Yes
Door Swing	Hinges on Left & Right
Handle Design	Designer Style
Color Appearance	Stainless Steel
Exterior Design	Contoured Door(s)
Dispenser Color	Stainless Steel
Textured Steel Case	Case Only - Dark Gray
Power / Ratings
Volts/Hertz/Amps	120v; 60Hz; 15A
